import { Button, Badge } from 'reactstrap'; import { Link, } from 'react-router-dom'; const MovieList = ({ movie }) => { return ( <>

{movie.Title} {movie.Rating}

{movie.Summary}

Actors: {movie.Actors}

Directors: {movie.Directors}

) } export default MovieList;
